name: Search_Flights

fromId.description: From/Departure location Id. fromId can be retrieved from api/v1/flights/searchDestination(Search Flight Location) endpoint in Flights collection as id.

toId.description: To/Arrival location Id. toId can be retrieved from api/v1/flights/searchDestination(Search Flight Location) endpoint in Flights collection as id.

departDate.description:
Departure or travel date.
Format: YYYY-MM-DD

stops.description:
Filters flights based on the number of stops. Accepted values are:
none for no preference (returns flights with any number of stops)
0 for non-stop flights
1 for one-stop flights
2 for two-stop flights
If provided, the value must be either none, 0, 1, or 2.

adults.description: The number of guests who are 18 years of age or older. The default value is set to 1.

children.description:
The number of children, including infants, who are under 18.
Example:
Child 1 Age = 8 months
Child 2 Age = 1 year
Child 3 Age = 17 years
Here is what the request parameter would look like:
children_age: 0,1,17

sort.description: This parameter orders result by BEST, CHEAPEST or FASTEST flights.

cabinClass.description: Search for flights that match the cabin class specified. Cabin call can be either ECONOMY, PREMIUM_ECONOMY, BUSINESS or FIRST.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

response_summary:
There are 203 available flights from Mumbai to New Delhi, with the cheapest option priced at $67.71 (rounded to $68). The flights are operated by three main airlines: Air India (115 flights starting at $71.10), IndiGo (55 flights starting at $67.71), and Etihad Airways (23 flights starting at $336.36). 

The fastest flight takes 2 hours, while the longest journey duration is 30 hours. Most flights include cabin baggage (195 options) and checked baggage (170 options). The cheapest flight is priced at $67.71, with a base fare of $57.11 and taxes of $10.60. 

Departure times are spread throughout the day, with 31 flights between midnight and 5:59 AM, 61 flights between 6:00 AM and 11:59 AM, and 54 flights between noon and 5:59 PM. Arrival times are similarly distributed, with 43 flights landing between midnight and 5:59 AM, 53 between 6:00 AM and 11:59 AM, and 48 between noon and 5:59 PM. 

The flight options include 51 non-stop flights, 195 one-stop flights, and 203 two-stop flights, all with similar minimum prices around $67.71. Baggage policies for each airline are available, with Air India, IndiGo, and Etihad Airways providing specific guidelines on their respective websites. 

The search results are personalized for frugal travelers, short-haul trips, and family travelers, though price alerts are currently not eligible for this search. The flights are all economy class, and the search criteria do not include any filters for direct flights only.
enhance_func_desc: This API is ideal for travelers planning flights between specified locations. It searches available flights based on departure and arrival IDs, with options to filter by stops, cabin class, and sort by best, cheapest, or fastest flights. Users receive detailed flight information including airlines, prices, durations, baggage policies, and departure/arrival times. The location IDs must be obtained from the SearchDestination API.

enhanced_parameters.sort: Sorts flights by best, cheapest, or fastest options.
enhanced_parameters.cabinClass: Filters flights by travel class (economy, business, etc.).

cabinClass.description: The class of the cabin for the flights, indicating that all flights in the search results are economy class.

code.description: The airline's IATA code, a two-letter designator used to identify airlines globally.

name.description: The full name of the airline as it is commonly known.

url.description: A direct link to the airline's baggage policy page for passengers to review specific guidelines.

FRUGAL_COMPANIONS.description: An array indicating the type of travelers for whom the search results are personalized, such as frugal travelers, short-haul trips, and family travelers.

ar_items.description: A string representing a specific traveler type for whom the flight search results are tailored.

isEligible.description: Indicates whether the current search is eligible for certain features (e.g., price alerts). False means it is not eligible.

isSearchEligible.description: Indicates whether the search itself is eligible for processing. True means the search can be performed.

isBlockoutEligible.description: Indicates whether the search is eligible for blockout periods (e.g., restricted booking times). True means it is eligible.

atolProtectedStatus.description: Indicates the ATOL protection status for the flights. 'NONE' suggests no ATOL protection is applicable for these flights.

searchId.description: A unique identifier for the search query, used to reference this specific search session.

banners.description: An array that would typically contain promotional or informational banners related to the search. Currently empty in this response.

ar_items.description: Expected to contain banner information, but no items are present in this response.

isOffersCabinClassExtended.description: Indicates whether the search results include extended cabin class options. 'false' means no extended cabin classes are included.

cabinClassExtension.description: An object that would contain details about extended cabin class options. Currently empty, indicating no extensions are available.

response_desc_list.description: Currency of the discount.

response_desc_list.name: units
response_desc_list.description: Whole number part of the discount.

response_desc_list.name: nanos
response_desc_list.description: Fractional part of the discount.

response_desc_list.name: totalWithoutDiscount
response_desc_list.description: Total price before any discounts are applied.

response_desc_list.name: currencyCode
response_desc_list.description: Currency of the total price without discount.

response_desc_list.name: units
response_desc_list.description: Whole number part of the total price without discount.

response_desc_list.name: nanos
response_desc_list.description: Fractional part of the total price without discount.

response_desc_list.name: totalWithoutDiscountRounded
response_desc_list.description: Rounded total price before any discounts are applied.

response_desc_list.name: currencyCode
response_desc_list.description: Currency of the rounded total price without discount.

response_desc_list.name: nanos
response_desc_list.description: Fractional part of the rounded total price without discount, typically zero.

response_desc_list.name: units
response_desc_list.description: Whole number part of the rounded total price without discount.

response_desc_list.name: travellerReference
response_desc_list.description: Reference identifier for the traveler, e.g., '1'.

response_desc_list.name: travellerType
response_desc_list.description: Type of traveler, e.g., 'ADULT'.

response_desc_list.name: brandedFaresShownByDefault
response_desc_list.description: Indicates whether branded fares are displayed by default in the search results.

response_desc_list.name: directFlightsOnlyFilterIgnored
response_desc_list.description: Indicates whether the filter for direct flights only was ignored in the search criteria.

response_desc_list.name: hideFlexiblePricesBanner
response_desc_list.description: Indicates whether the banner for flexible prices is hidden in the search results.

response_desc_list.name: cabinClass
response_desc_list.description: The class of the cabin for the flights, indicating that all flights in the search results are economy class.

response_desc_list.name: code
response_desc_list.description: The airline's IATA code, a two-letter designator used to identify airlines globally.

response_desc_list.name: name
response_desc_list.description: The full name of the airline as it is commonly known.

response_desc_list.name: url
response_desc_list.description: A direct link to the airline's baggage policy page for passengers to review specific guidelines.

response_desc_list.name: FRUGAL_COMPANIONS
response_desc_list.description: An array indicating the type of travelers for whom the search results are personalized, such as frugal travelers, short-haul trips, and family travelers.

response_desc_list.name: FRUGAL_COMPANIONS[]
response_desc_list.description: A string representing a specific traveler type for whom the flight search results are tailored.

response_desc_list.name: isEligible
response_desc_list.description: Indicates whether the current search is eligible for certain features (e.g., price alerts). False means it is not eligible.

response_desc_list.name: isSearchEligible
response_desc_list.description: Indicates whether the search itself is eligible for processing. True means the search can be performed.

response_desc_list.name: isBlockoutEligible
response_desc_list.description: Indicates whether the search is eligible for blockout periods (e.g., restricted booking times). True means it is eligible.

response_desc_list.name: atolProtectedStatus
response_desc_list.description: Indicates the ATOL protection status for the flights. 'NONE' suggests no ATOL protection is applicable for these flights.

response_desc_list.name: searchId
response_desc_list.description: A unique identifier for the search query, used to reference this specific search session.

response_desc_list.name: banners
response_desc_list.description: An array that would typically contain promotional or informational banners related to the search. Currently empty in this response.

response_desc_list.name: banners[]
response_desc_list.description: Expected to contain banner information, but no items are present in this response.

response_desc_list.name: isOffersCabinClassExtended
response_desc_list.description: Indicates whether the search results include extended cabin class options. 'false' means no extended cabin classes are included.

response_desc_list.name: cabinClassExtension
response_desc_list.description: An object that would contain details about extended cabin class options. Currently empty, indicating no extensions are available.
